data.title: Pursuing master study in Data Science
data.tasks: Attending Data Engineering, Machine Learning, and Big Data. Learning about DevOps practices to support data pipelines and production systems.

data.title: Doing AWS Certified Developer Associate
data.tasks: Studying AWS core services and best practices. Building serverless applications using AWS Lambda and API Gateway. Learning how to deploy and manage applications on AWS. Gaining hands-on experience in cloud environments.

data.title: Practicing web development
data.tasks: Developing full-stack web applications using modern web technologies. Working with relational and non-relational databases.
